delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Quiz Group {{ title }}? All assigned Questions will be unmapped.

quizPool.dragExplanation: Drag the question below to assign it to a group.
quizPool.groupExplanation: Questions in the same group will be randomly chosen for each student. Questions that are not in a group will be assigned to all students.
quizPool.updated: Updated Quiz Pool with identifier {{ param }}

invalidReasons.groupNameLength: Group name cannot be longer than 100 characters.
invalidReasons.groupNoQuestion: Group {{name}}: Group does not have any question.
invalidReasons.groupHasDifferentQuestionPoints: Group {{name}}: Group has questions with different points.
